reactor.util.context

接口 Context


  • public interface Context
    A key/value store that is propagated between components such as operators via the context protocol. Contexts are ideal to transport orthogonal information such as tracing or security tokens.

    Context implementations are thread-safe and immutable: mutative operations like put(Object, Object) will in fact return a new Context instance.

    Note that contexts are optimized for low cardinality key/value storage, and a user might want to associate a dedicated mutable structure to a single key to represent his own context instead of using multiple put(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object), which could be more costly. Past five user key/value pair, the Context will use a copy-on-write implementation backed by a new Map on each put(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object).

      Return a new Context that will resolve all existing keys except the removed one, key.
      static Context empty()
      Return an empty Context
      default <T> T get(Class<T> key)
      Resolve a value given a type key within the Context.

      Resolve a value given a key that exists within the Context, or throw a NoSuchElementException if the key is not present.

      Resolve a value given a key within the Context.

      Resolve a value given a key within the Context.

      Return true if a particular key resolves to a value within the Context.

    • 方法详细资料

      • empty

        static Context empty()
        Return an empty Context
        返回:
        an empty Context

      • of

        static Context of(Object key,
                  Object value)
        Create a Context pre-initialized with one key-value pair.
        参数:
        key - the key to initialize.
        value - the value for the key.
        返回:
        a Context with a single entry.

      • of

        static Context of(Object key1,
                  Object value1,
                  Object key2,
                  Object value2)
        Create a Context pre-initialized with two key-value pairs.
        参数:
        key1 - the first key to initialize.
        value1 - the value for the first key.
        key2 - the second key to initialize.
        value2 - the value for the second key.
        返回:
        a Context with two entries.

      • of

        static Context of(Object key1,
                  Object value1,
                  Object key2,
                  Object value2,
                  Object key3,
                  Object value3)
        Create a Context pre-initialized with three key-value pairs.
        参数:
        key1 - the first key to initialize.
        value1 - the value for the first key.
        key2 - the second key to initialize.
        value2 - the value for the second key.
        key3 - the third key to initialize.
        value3 - the value for the third key.
        返回:
        a Context with three entries.

      • of

        static Context of(Object key1,
                  Object value1,
                  Object key2,
                  Object value2,
                  Object key3,
                  Object value3,
                  Object key4,
                  Object value4)
        Create a Context pre-initialized with four key-value pairs.
        参数:
        key1 - the first key to initialize.
        value1 - the value for the first key.
        key2 - the second key to initialize.
        value2 - the value for the second key.
        key3 - the third key to initialize.
        value3 - the value for the third key.
        key4 - the fourth key to initialize.
        value4 - the value for the fourth key.
        返回:
        a Context with four entries.

      • of

        static Context of(Object key1,
                  Object value1,
                  Object key2,
                  Object value2,
                  Object key3,
                  Object value3,
                  Object key4,
                  Object value4,
                  Object key5,
                  Object value5)
        Create a Context pre-initialized with five key-value pairs.
        参数:
        key1 - the first key to initialize.
        value1 - the value for the first key.
        key2 - the second key to initialize.
        value2 - the value for the second key.
        key3 - the third key to initialize.
        value3 - the value for the third key.
        key4 - the fourth key to initialize.
        value4 - the value for the fourth key.
        key5 - the fifth key to initialize.
        value5 - the value for the fifth key.
        返回:
        a Context with five entries.

      • get

        <T> T get(Object key)
        Resolve a value given a key that exists within the Context, or throw a NoSuchElementException if the key is not present.
        类型参数:
        T - an unchecked casted generic for fluent typing convenience
        参数:
        key - a lookup key to resolve the value within the context
        返回:
        the value resolved for this key (throws if key not found)
        抛出:
        NoSuchElementException - when the given key is not present
        另请参阅:
        getOrDefault(Object, Object), getOrEmpty(Object), hasKey(Object)

      • get

        default <T> T get(Class<T> key)
        Resolve a value given a type key within the Context.
        类型参数:
        T - an unchecked casted generic for fluent typing convenience
        参数:
        key - a type key to resolve the value within the context
        返回:
        the value resolved for this type key (throws if key not found)
        抛出:
        NoSuchElementException - when the given type key is not present
        另请参阅:
        getOrDefault(Object, Object), getOrEmpty(Object)

      • getOrDefault

        @Nullable
default <T> T getOrDefault(Object key,
                                     @Nullable
                                     T defaultValue)
        Resolve a value given a key within the Context. If unresolved return the passed default value.
        参数:
        key - a lookup key to resolve the value within the context
        defaultValue - a fallback value if key doesn't resolve
        返回:
        the value resolved for this key, or the given default if not present

      • getOrEmpty

        default <T> Optional<T> getOrEmpty(Object key)
        Resolve a value given a key within the Context.
        参数:
        key - a lookup key to resolve the value within the context
        返回:
        an Optional of the value for that key.

      • hasKey

        boolean hasKey(Object key)
        Return true if a particular key resolves to a value within the Context.
        参数:
        key - a lookup key to test for
        返回:
        true if this context contains the given key

      • isEmpty

        default boolean isEmpty()
        Return true if the Context is empty.
        返回:
        true if the Context is empty.

      • put

        Context put(Object key,
            Object value)
        Create a new Context that contains all current key/value pairs plus the given key/value pair. If that key existed in the current Context, its associated value is replaced in the resulting Context.
        参数:
        key - the key to add/update in the new Context
        value - the value to associate to the key in the new Context
        返回:
        a new Context including the provided key/value

      • delete

        Context delete(Object key)
        Return a new Context that will resolve all existing keys except the removed one, key.

        Note that if this Context doesn't contain the key, this method simply returns this same instance.

        参数:
        key - the key to remove.
        返回:
        a new Context that doesn't include the provided key

      • stream

        Stream<Map.Entry<Object,Object>> stream()
        Stream key/value pairs from this Context
        返回:
        a Stream of key/value pairs held by this context

      • putAll

        default Context putAll(Context other)
        Create a new Context by merging the content of this context and a given Context. If the other context is empty, the same Context instance is returned.
        参数:
        other - the other Context to get values from
        返回:
        a new Context with a merge of the entries from this context and the given context.
